summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of November 1 to November 30, 2015. It details the account balance, transactions, and service charges incurred during this period.

persons.name: Philip Hmchre
persons.context: Philip Hmchre is identified as the relationship manager for the business account of Shocker Holdings LLC.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Shocker Holdings LLC.
The statement covers the period from November 1, 2015, to November 30, 2015.
The beginning balance was $146,859.35 and the ending balance was $146,849.35.
A service charge of $10.00 was withdrawn on November 12, 2015.
The document indicates that the business did not meet the criteria for a waived service charge based on credit card spending.
